availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Davis Catlin (Haysville, Marion County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Haysville, Marion County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Colbert Catlin in Marion County in October 1852. Father of Perry Catlin, Maria Catlin, Minerva Catlin, Jessie Catlin. Stepfather of Mary Gray, Sarah Gray, Martha Gray, William Gray, James Gray. Farmer in Marion County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District 2, p. 74.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Haysville, p. 70.
